member.name: T:C1.Silverlight.RichTextBox.PdfFilter.PdfFilter
member.summary: Provides extension methods to export content to PDF.

member.name: M:C1.Silverlight.RichTextBox.PdfFilter.PdfFilter.PrintDocument(C1.Silverlight.RichTextBox.Documents.C1Document,C1.Silverlight.Pdf.C1PdfDocument,System.Windows.Thickness)
member.returns: True if the print was successful
